welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gorakhpur, a city known for its rich history, religious significance, and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Sheesh Mahal Resorts, Fatehabad

restaurants.address: Sheesh Mahal Resorts (Ratia Road), Fatehābād 125050, Haryāna

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gorakhpur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gorakhpur Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
